Uses of Class
ray.rage.math.Transform

  • Packages that use Transform 
    Package Description
    ray.rage.math  

    • Uses of Transform in ray.rage.math

      Methods in ray.rage.math that return Transform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Transform Transform.createDefault()
      Creates a new transform with its position at the origin, no rotation, and no scaling.
      static Transform Transform.createFrom(Transform xform)
      Creates a new transform based on the given transform.
      static Transform Transform.createFrom(Vector3 position)
      Creates a new transform with the given position, no rotation, and no scaling.
      static Transform Transform.createFrom(Vector3 position, Matrix3 rotation)
      Creates a new transform with the given position and rotation, but no scaling.
      static Transform Transform.createFrom(Vector3 position, Matrix3 rotation, Vector3 scale)
      Creates a new transform with the given position, rotation, and scaling.
      Transform Transform.setPosition(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the position of this transform using primitive types.
      Transform Transform.setPosition(Vector3 position)
      Sets the position vector of this transform.
      Transform Transform.setRotation(Matrix3 rotation)
      Sets the rotation matrix of this transform.
      Transform Transform.setScale(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the scaling of this transform using primitive types.
      Transform Transform.setScale(Vector3 scale)
      Sets the scaling vector of this transform.
      Methods in ray.rage.math with parameters of type Transform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Transform Transform.createFrom(Transform xform)
      Creates a new transform based on the given transform.
